Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive_01>Today in the Lucky Clover Gazette...
"<clr:0000>Mysterious Shrines Appear All Over the
World Overnight<clr:ffff>"...
"Shrines appear everywhere due to shifts
caused by the Upheaval.

"With Purah as their leader, the Zonai
Survey Team begins thorough
investigations the world over."
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_01>Huh. Guess this paper is a little old.
Goodbye_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>If you want to know what's happening in
the world, chatting at a<clr:0000> stable<clr:ffff> is the best
way. Newspapers are handy, too, though.
